channel.title: [Class Suggestion] - The Doomsayer - Neutral Offensive
channel.description:
**Neutral Offensive** **Goal:** Live to see three of your prophecies pass. _____________ **Passives:** **Unrelenting:** Immune to most occupation and redirection abilities. **Doom's Company**: Immune to death at night. ___________ _**Day Abilities:**_
**Prophecy of Doom (unlimited uses):** Mark a player as doomed for the night. If they die, a prophecy will have passed. _[NOTE: This can target King, but night abilities cannot]_ ______ **_Night Abilities:_**
**Path of Doom (unlimited uses):** Prevent non-attack abilities targeting your target. You cannot target the same person two nights in a row. **Curse of Doom (3 uses):** Curse a player, removing their death and occupy immunities and occupying them for the night.
_______________

item.title: [Class Suggestion] - The Doomsayer - Neutral Offensive
item.dc:creator: Planterror
item.description:
THE END IS COMING
